USA: Anne, Queen of Great Britain died and was succeeded by George I of Great Britain.
Russia: The northwestern territory of the Kazan Governorate was transferred to the newly established Nizhny Novgorod Governorate.
England: Queen Anne dies. Accession of George I, Elector of Hanover.
Bhutan: Tibetan forces, aided by the Mongols, invade Bhutan but fail to gain control.
Belgium: Treaty of Rastatt signed: hostilities between France and Austria arising from War of the Spanish Succession cease; Spanish Netherlands become Austrian Netherlands.
